creator: Mobilaxy: Kids Math Games
descriptionHtml:
Come along on your hamster's KS2 multiplication tables adventure and be prepared for the online multiplication tables check (MTC) at the end of year 4 in primary schools! 🎓📚👍

Your child will begin their learning quest with their hamster as he flies to new mystical worlds with his colorful balloons. ⛰️🏞️🌴🐹🎈 Play and laugh with as they discover what fun it is to learn to multiply! 😄 Shown equations one by one, kids must pass each multiplying chart to continue to the next. Answer the maths flash cards correctly and the hamster continues his maths adventure. Miss more than 2x and POP- it's game over.

Learning with advanced teaching methods!

In addition to making learning multiplication tables for KS2 entertaining and easy for children through multiplication games, Times Tables and Friends integrates research-backed, auditory-, verbal-, visual- and kinesthetic teaching techniques, to support long-term memory acquisition.

Five interactive modes and more - a cool, KS2 maths game for learners at all levels!

With five interactive modes available in just one kids maths game, learners at all levels have a precious opportunity to develop their multiplication skills:

🎮 Game mode: Follow along with your hamster on his balloon journey as your child gradually progresses to more difficult multiplication table sets. This game mode features beautiful animated backgrounds and cute graphics guaranteed to make your child laugh as they build expertise in tables 1-20.

📕 Learning mode: Looking for an introduction to times tables or need help memorizing new table sets for school multiplication worksheets? Learning mode provides a state-of-the-art, Montessori-backed method of teaching, using auditory, verbal and kinetic educational stages as well as color identification, scientifically proven to support memory acquisition. Engaging in listening 👂, speaking aloud 🎤 and writing out each problem ✍️, your child will enjoy learning their tables as they pass through each interactive task.

This game mode's easy to follow, lessons are also perfect to give gifted children as young as 3-years old a head start to multiplication tables.

🏆 Challenge mode: Designed for advanced multiplication tables learners, the hamster cheers players on in challenge mode as they are pressed to respond quickly to multiplication problems before the clock slowly runs out. Answer correctly to win more time with the help of a few handy bonuses that stop the clock, eliminate 50% of the answers or replace the multiplication problem entirely.

The more solved maths problems, the higher the game quiz score, giving your child a fun opportunity to compete with their friends and classmates.

💪 Training mode: Need extra multiplication practice within a particular multiplication table or want to target the multiplication problems your child is struggling with most? Training game mode allows users to select the maths problems they need help with most and answer as many correctly as possible. Unlike other games, this model additionally reinforces memory by having problems and answers read aloud. And of course, your hamster joins along too!

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Two Player mode: Play face-to-face on a single split screen and see who can solve maths problems more quickly. Not the winner? Don't worry. With the help of the other game modes, your child will be on top in no time.

Additional Features:
- Earn and collect badges as you complete more tasks and display high performance in each of the maths quiz modes. 🥇🥈🥉
- Track your child's progress through the achievements board. 🏆🏆🏆
- Available in English, Danish, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Norwegian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish and Turkish opening the possibility for language learning too!

The national curriculum in England specifies that pupils at the end of year 4 in primary schools should be able to recall the multiplication tables up to and including 12x12.
descriptionShort: Practice multiplication for kids with ks2 maths, times tables games!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Now offering multiplication tables 13-20 in Challenge-, Game- and 2-Player Mode.
- Exciting new game mode interface!

title: Times Tables Games: KS2 Multiplication to 20x20!

creator: Mobilaxy: Card and Kids Math Games
descriptionHtml:
Free times table & mental maths games for kids!


Learn math with one of the most brilliant and engaging times tables games today! Ditch old school classroom methods and make learning times tables for kids, or math learner, fun! 😄 Your child can start earning top marks and join the club of times tables rock stars! An adapted mind requires constant practice inside and outside of the classroom with cool math games like these. 🎓📚👍 This app and its learning style make it so that no math learner is left behind! No mental maths is necessary to see that these cool math games of times tables for kids are a total blast.

Choose from 5 brilliant maths games on our learning playground🎮



🎮 Mental Maths Game Mode 🎮
Your kid will begin their maths game with the hamster and his colorful balloons. 🐹🎈 Join and learn mental maths while discovering new mystical worlds in this playground of learning! 🏞️🌴 Score top marks and the hamster will continue his multiplication games! 🤗 This game and its learning approach provides a brilliant playground for your kid to grow and learn while having fun.

📕 Math Learner Practice Stages 📕
Are you or your child a beginner maths learner? Learning game mode is the best place to start for any maths learner to become familiar with times tables. In no time at all this app gives you the motivation and skill to go from mental maths novices to times tables rock stars.

Our brain 🧠 can absorb the most from these quick maths games when we engage all our senses! Classroom teaching methods of times tables focus on perceptive memory. Each brilliant auditory 👂, verbal 🎤 and kinesthetic ✍️ lesson exercises the brain and its learning storage. You’ll see the cool math games pay off while your little math learner enjoys getting better at times tables and ultimately becomes one of the smartest times tables rock stars.
🏆 Revision Timetable Master - Challenge mode 🏆
Answer as many quick maths exercises as possible with a timer! This way your kids learn can mental maths competitively and learn to be a faster math solver.

💪 Revision Timetable Learning Mode 💪
Select and focus on the math facts of your choice. Even a brilliant math solver with the most adapted mind can use some practice. This playground of learning keeps kids motivated and focused on memorizing times tables.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Multiplayer Playground Mode 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
Challenge other kids from school to a competition of times tables with these cool math games! Which math solver will be the classroom star and earn top marks? Quick maths times tables are more fun with friends and family!

join the club of times tables rock stars 🎓📚


Take your kid’s education to the next level when you introduce times tables for kids! The key to top marks is just a download away for your little math learner. Times tables rock stars don’t learn their mental maths overnight – they keep themselves sharp by playing cool math games. Whether you’re searching for classroom activities to motivate any maths learner or seeking out cool math games for your little one, our free times table games provide the fun and motivation to develop quick maths skills. This app and its learning approach are an excellent way to develop an adapted mind and enjoy times tables.
descriptionShort: Any Math Learner Can Earn Top Marks & Become Brilliant Times Tables Rock Stars

title: Times Tables for Kids: Adapted Mind Maths Games

creator: Mobilaxy: Kids Math Games
descriptionHtml:
Free multiplication & mental maths games for kids! Learn math with one of the most engaging and exciting math revision games today! Ditch old school classroom math learning and make learning times tables fun by using all the different modes in this incredible learning game! Earn stars, beat the clock, and move through stages. After just a few rounds, your little one will be a math rock stars in no time! Switch up math practice in the classroom with these brilliant multiplication games designed to supplement memorizing math flash cards & multiplication tables. This cool math practice game makes learning a blast.

Game Mode
Your kid will begin their times tables multiplication with the hamster and his colorful balloons. Join and learn math facts while discovering new, mystical worlds. Answer the math flash cards correctly and earn stars. As you successfully complete each level’s math problems, the hamster will continue his multiplication games. The hamster is the ultimate teacher, here to help your little one become a super math rock star!

Practice Levels
New to 2nd grade math or 3rd grade math? Learning game mode is the best place to start learning multiplication tables! Our brain absorbs the most from these free multiplication games when we engage all of our senses! Classroom teaching methods of times tables and multiplication focus on perceptive memory. Each auditory, verbal and kinesthetic lesson exercises the brain. You’ll see the math practice pay off while your kid enjoys getting better at times tables.

Challenge mode
Answer as many “math practice” exercises as possible with a timer! Your kids can learn mental math as they try to beat the clock.

Learning Mode
Select and focus on the math problems of your choice. This is perfect for 2nd grade math or 3rd grade math students focusing on times tables & multiplication. Spending time learning each math problem through listening and tracing will enhance your child’s gameplay and allow them to enjoy the other modes of this game.

Multiplayer mode
Challenge other kids from school to a 1:1 competition of times tables! Who can answer each of the math flash cards faster? Multiplication tables are even more fun with friends and family. Learning mode allows for split-screen gameplay. Have a blast while challenging others and learning math skills.

Take your kid’s education to the next level! Each level of this game grants your kid the tools to start learning classroom math quickly and easily. The best part is that times tables multiplication and mental math expertise is only a download away. With this cool math game, your kid will gain the skills to ace the next times tables quiz.
descriptionShort: Where Any Maths Learner Can Become a Brilliant Times Tables Rock Star!
